name: shea-blog
description: 个人博客系统 - 包含前端展示和邮件联系功能

scripts.test-smtp: node -e "require('dotenv').config(); const nodemailer = require('nodemailer'); const transporter = nodemailer.createTransport({ host: process.env.SMTP_HOST, port: process.env.SMTP_PORT, secure: false, requireTLS: true, auth: { user: process.env.SMTP_USER, pass: process.env.SMTP_PASS } }); transporter.verify().then(() => console.log('✅ SMTP connection successful')).catch(err => console.log('❌ SMTP error:', err.message));"
